title: when I turn on computer I always get a split screen.  I want the full screen so I can see my emails, etc.
content: I am trying to get a full screen for my mail etc. Now every time I turn on my computer I get a split screen and I am unable to see the full content of my emails, etc. What do I do to correct this problem?
creator: itsme501

title: Keep getting "Not logged in. Please log in to continue" message
content: I keep getting "Not logged in. Please log in to continue" message when I go to play Backgammon Live (a Facebook game) link text . I've been using Foxfire to play this game for years and never had an issue until a couple of days ago. I did a uninstall/reinstall, cleared data, cleared cache but nothing fixes this issue. Please help! Edge and Chrome doesn't have this issue but those browser are too slow for this particular game. Firefox works great when its working.
creator: genghis.boy
